description:
Douglas is a man of few words. He's so quiet that I'm never sure what's going on his head.
But... it's always the quiet ones you have to watch out for!
"I want to get fucked."
That's what he said to me in a text message after his last video. I love that he can be direct when he wants to be!
Brodie has also been in the mood for lots of stuff lately. Actually, he's kind of been on a bender with the man sex. I really think he's enjoying it, even if he does talk about his girlfriend a lot.
It seemed that Douglas had an underlying admiration for Brodie. Maybe it's because most people admire the traits in others that they don't have themselves. Brodie is definitely aggressive and outgoing!
I was actually surprised that Douglas turned out to be the aggressor. He started off with some massage oil and then quickly worked his way down to Brodie's cock, taking the whole thing into his mouth.
For never having had a cock in his ass, Douglas was quite the little power bottom!
title: Douglas & Brodie
